gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.quickSetup.title: Quick Setup
gettingStarted.quickSetup.connectSetupUR: Recommended method to configure Self-hosted LiveSync.
Use only if you don't have Setup URI.
gettingStarted.quickSetup.enableLiveSync: Only continue once you have fully completed one of the setup options above.

gettingStarted.setupOther.copyConfigToQR: Scan to transfer your current settings.
